sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default class Profile extends Component { state = { alesReq: null, sgk: null, experience: null, ALESResult: null, englishExamResult: null, referenceLetter: null, referenceLetter2: null, statementOfPurpose: null, ALESResultInput: null, experinceInput: null, success: false, }; upload = async (event) => { const target = event.target; const name = target.name; var fileInput = event.target.files[0]; var fileName= event.target.files[0].name; var myHeaders = new Headers(); myHeaders.append("Authorization", window.localStorage.getItem("token")); var formdata = new FormData(); formdata.append("title", name); formdata.append("document", fileInput, fileName); var requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: myHeaders, body: formdata, redirect: 'follow' }; fetch("http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/documents/upload/", requestOptions) .then(response => response.text()) .then(result => console.log(result)) .catch(error => console.log('error', error)); }; //If applicant applis with ALES, then the Ales Result is needed from the applicant ALESReqHandle = (event) => { const target = event.target; if (target.value === "Yes") { this.setState({ ALESResultInput: (

ALES result file

), }); } else { this.setState({ ALESResultInput: (

I have at least 1250 days of working experience documented by the relevant government body (in Turkey, SGK)

Yes
No
), }); } }; //If applicant is experienced, than the Working experience document is wanted from user experienceHandle = (event) => { const target = event.target; if (target.value === "Yes") { this.setState({ experinceInput: (

Working Experience Document

), }); } else { this.setState({ experinceInput: null }); } }; render() { return (

UPLOAD DOCUMENTS

Photo

Undergrad Transcript
Change Password {this.state.passportArea}

{this.state.myProfile.firstname + " "+this.state.myProfile.middlename +" "+ this.state.myProfile.lastname }

{this.state.myProfile.email}

PROGRAM

); } }
